author: pacrob
content:
Hey folks! We're adding basic EIP-2537 support to the `py_ecc` library. I've followed the existing patterns and reference docs/tests as best I can, but I'm not a cryptographer. Could someone take a look when they have time?  - https://github.com/ethereum/py_ecc/pull/146

Just looking for gut-check, verifying that I'm not missing or breaking something horribly ðŸ˜„
Thanks!
